tool_description: 🥇 #1 Chinese alibaba.com eCommerce platform data API provider. Access all data instantly in 🕒 REAL-TIME.
name: Alibaba DataHub
title: Alibaba DataHub

api_list.name: Alibaba - Item Search [Keyword | Category]
api_list.description: Item Search api for alibaba.com website

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The `Currency` parameter is used to display the product price in the selected currency. All values are being validated and only the ones from the list are supported. Full list of supporting currencies, please use '**Currency List**' at '**Base**' group endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: The `Region` parameter is used to accurately get the shipping costs and other promo/deals or availability for items based on geo-locations. All values are being validated and only the ones from the list are supported. Full list of supporting locale options, please use '**Country List**' at '**Base**' group endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: The `Locale` parameter is used to display the titles and other content in the selected language. All values are being validated and only the ones from the list are supported. Full list of supporting locale options, please use '**Locale List'** at '**Base**' group endpoints.

Image Region is the search focus position from the given image. Eg.: 120,45,190,150
